author: MICHAEL BALSAMO and MICHAEL R. SISAK Associated Press
title: Barr orders increase in home confinement as virus surges
description: Attorney General William Barr has ordered the Bureau of Prisons to increase the use of home confinement
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Attorney General William Barr ordered the Bureau of Prisons on Friday to increase the use of home confinement and expedite the release of eligible high-risk inmates at three federal prisons where coronavirus cases have skyrocketed. 
Officials… [+2878 chars]
